components

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • components.GameComponents
      • components.Tile

  • public class Tile
extends GameComponents
    This class is for creating the tiles objects in the game. Tiles are similar to cards that can be placed on the game board.
    Author:
    Team B

      • Tile

        public Tile(Tile.TileType t,
    int val)
        Constructor specifying the type of tile. A tile of with a valid type can be created with this constructor.
        Parameters:
        t - An enum type of type 'TileType'. It can have the values RESOURCES, HAZARD, etc as per the definition of the enum TileType.
